description:
SNMP Based Dashboard to Monitor Dell Hosts via iDRAC from orginal dashboard by ilovepancakes95 
Adapted to flux by cybaen

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "system-servicetag" or r._field == "system-model" or r._field == "power-state" or r._field == "system-globalstatus" or r._field == "system-uptime" or r._field == "idrac-url")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> unique(column: "system-name")
|> keep(columns: ["system-name", "system-servicetag", "system-model", "power-state","system-globalstatus","system-uptime","idrac-url"])
|> group()
|> sort(columns: ["system-name"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "system-globalstatus")
|> group(columns: ["_field", "system-name"]) // Group by field and system name
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "system-name"])
|> sort(columns: ["system-name", "_time"], desc: false)
|> aggregateWindow(every:5m, fn:last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["system-name"])
|> keep(columns: ["system-name"])
|> distinct(column: "host")
|> group()
|> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "system-uptime")

//SELECT "system-servicetag" FROM /^$idrac_host$/ WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "system-servicetag")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "system-servicetag")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "system-watts")
|> drop(columns:["agent_host","host", "system-name"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^cpu[0-9]-temp$/)
|> drop(columns:["agent_host","host", "system-name"])
|> toFloat()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 10.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cmos-batterystate")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "raid-batterystate")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bios-version")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "storage-status")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "memory-status")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp-status")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "intrusion-sensor")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "system-osname" or r._field == "system-osversion")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> unique(column: "system-osname")
|> keep(columns: ["system-osname", "system-osversion"])
|> group()
|> sort(columns: ["system-osname"], desc: false)

//SELECT "log-dates" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "log-number" LIMIT 1
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "log-dates" or r["_field"] == "log-entry" or r["_field"] == "log-severity")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> unique(column: "log-dates")
|> keep(columns: [ "log-dates","log-entry","log-severity"])
|> group()
|> sort(columns: ["log-dates"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inlet-temp" or r._field == "exhaust-temp")
|> drop(columns:["agent_host","host", "system-name"])
|> toFloat()
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 10.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "disks-capacity" or r._field == "disks-state" or r._field == "disks-predictivefail")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> unique(column: "disks-name")
|> keep(columns: ["disks-name", "disks-capacity", "disks-state","disks-predictivefail"])
|> group()
|> sort(columns: ["disks-name"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${hostslist_key}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^fan[0-9]-speed$/)
|> drop(columns:["agent_host","host", "system-name"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: now())
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system-name"] == "${idrac_host}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nic-current_mac" or r["_field"] == "nic-status" or r["_field"] == "nic-vendor")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> unique(column: "nic-name")
|> keep(columns: ["nic-name", "nic-current_mac", "nic-status","nic-vendor"])
|> group()
|> sort(columns: ["nic-name"], desc: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["system-name"])
|> keep(columns: ["system-name"])
|> distinct(column: "host")
|> group()
list.label: iDRAC Host
list.name: idrac_host

query.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["system-name"])
|> keep(columns: ["system-name"])
|> distinct(column: "host")
|> group()

list.description: key tag of the hosts list. By default the value is "idrac-hosts" as per telegraf default configuration
list.name: hostslist_key

title: iDRAC - Host Stats
